text: The way we use money today is archaic, not only is insecure but it comes accompanied with taxes and debts. With Chavezcoin, a Venezuela exclusive cryptocurrency, we will enter a new territory, where all venezuelan people will know a new way to appreciate money.

Chavezcoin is digital and encrypted, it has one of the safest technologies in the world to make transactions, shopping, sales, and transfers. The money, as we know it, needs third parties such as banks to make transactions, Chavezcoin is decentralized, which means that it doesn't require third parties nor any financial nor gubernamental entity to work.

All the transactions done by users have a really low fee. The security level is, without a doubt, one of the most secure in the world thanks to the blockchain, which cannot be altered by users, not even by us. Once the coin is in internet, nothing can stop it.
